title: The Great Reset Exposed Before Election Day (Ep 1886)
description:
In this episode, I address a Time magazine piece where they confess to trying to rig the 2020 election. I also address the Great Reset and how it relates to this coming Election Day. 

News Picks:


Remember this Time piece where they confess to a scheme to interfere in the 2020 election.

Rumble will not cave to totalitarian governments.

Joe Biden’s illicit election scheme has been uncovered.



Major election update out of Pennsylvania. 

Forty percent of households will pay NO income taxes this year.


The growing threat of artificial intelligence. 

Biden gets caught lying, AGAIN.


Our military is operating inside of Ukraine.
